name: To Rule Them All
description:
You are the new prince of a desolated city. It is on you now to bring this domain to flourish. Choose 3 of 6 vassals to follow your bidding, but beware not everyone is loyal to their new conquerer.

Build your domain. Hold the herd strong and the blood flow steady or you all will hunger.
Create guhles and let new vampires in, but everything has a price.
Don't break the masquerade or your reign will be over.

Project stats:

working time: 110h 

used software: Game Maker Studio 2, Affinity photo, word, davinci resolve

ca. 30 different events.

25 pages to read

(Reading the events is optional. But you should, or you die without knowing why.)

Playtime: 20min one run.

Note: Press Esc to leave game.
